### MKS Test

For more information, see [here](https://rileywheadon.github.io/ffa-docs/eda-change-points/#mann-kendall-sneyers-test). 

`r params$msg`

Additional information:

- Number of crossings: `r nrow(params$crossing_df)`
- Number of significant crossings: `r nrow(params$change_df)`
- Significance threshold: `r round(params$bound, 2)`

<!-- Render the figure. -->

```{r, echo = FALSE, out.width = "80%", fig.align = "center", dpi = 150}
img_name <- glue("mks_{params$start}_{params$end}.png")
knitr::include_graphics(file.path(params$img_dir, img_name))
```
